_meanings:
{@--4@} Behind the back, secretly, 
covertly. ({#pfzWataH kf#} means {1} to place
on the back, leave behind. {2} to 
neglect, forsake, abandon. {3} to 
renounce, desist from, leave off, 
resign; {#yenASAH pfzWataH kftvA#} 
{#nErASyamavalaMbitaM#} <ls>H. 1. 144</ls>; {#lajjAM pfzWataH kftvA#} <ls>K.</ls>;
{#pfzWato gam#} to follow; {#pfzWato BU#} {1} to
stand at the back. {2} to be 
disregarded).
